pr_title: Simplify entire edges on import instead of just pillar nodes

timeline.bodyText: instruction 4 that went away was "continue onto Margarethenstraße"
timeline.author: msbarry

timeline.bodyText: these changes are probably because by forcing simplification to always keep the closest pillar node to each tower node, we had been getting a bit more resolution on the angles into and out of each intersection.
timeline.author: msbarry

timeline.message: move endpoint removal into douglas peucker

timeline.bodyText: at first I was creating a shallow copy excluding first and last points, but then I tried this approach of removing the first and last point as part of simplification and it was consistently faster than the shallow copy approach on a medium size ~1GB extract (US northeast)
timeline.author: msbarry

replies.bodyText: alright, looks like that wasn't safe because it needs to remove first and last point whether you simplify or not.
replies.author: msbarry
